reg_info.act_under: Labour Relations Act   Loi sur les relations de travail

content.content: 1. Sections 138.2 to 138.5 of the Act are designated as provisions in respect of which the Board may make rules to expedite proceedings. O.Reg. 18/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Sections 138.2 to 138.5 of the Act are designated as provisions in respect of which the Board may make rules to expedite proceedings. O.Reg. 18/94, s. 1.
